headline: The Bull Case For SLB (SLB) Could Change Following Launch of Tela AI Assistant – Learn Why
summary: In early November 2025, SLB announced the launch of Tela™, an agentic AI assistant designed to transform the upstream energy sector by automating workflows and improving decision-making using conversational AI embedded within the company's platforms. This innovation is uniquely tailored to address complex industry challenges such as workforce reduction and technical difficulties, positioning Tela to enhance productivity and efficiency across energy operations. We’ll now explore how Tela’s...

headline: SLB N.V. (SLB) Faced Headwinds from a Challenging Macro-Economic Environment
summary: Ariel Investments, an investment management company, released its “Ariel Focus Fund” third-quarter investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. US equities increased significantly in the third quarter, driven by the Federal Reserve’s first rate cut, strong corporate earnings growth, and broadening market participation. In this environment, the fund increased by 20.76%, […]

headline: Petronas signs MoUs to advance seismic imaging and AI initiatives
summary: The MoUs involve organisations such as Beicip-Franlab, ConocoPhillips, Eliis, Microsoft, PTTEP, Shell, SLB and TotalEnergies.
